# uptimekuma_notification_aliyunsms (Resource)

Aliyun SMS notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_aliyunsms" "example" {
  name              = "Aliyun SMS Notification"
  is_active         = true
  is_default        = false
  access_key_id     = "your-access-key-id"
  secret_access_key = "your-secret-access-key"
  phone_number      = "+1234567890"
  sign_name         = "YourCompanyName"
  template_code     = "SMS_001"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `access_key_id` (String, Sensitive) Aliyun access key ID
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `phone_number` (String) Phone number to send SMS to
- `secret_access_key` (String, Sensitive) Aliyun secret access key
- `sign_name` (String) Aliyun SMS sign name
- `template_code` (String) Aliyun SMS template code

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
